column2: probably too much for my own good
column3: so I was really looking forward to eating here after having heard such glowing reviews. Maybe it was the anticipation
column4: maybe it was a bad day
column5: but I was sorely disappointed. The pork was just barely OK - way too dependent on the BBQ sauce for flavor
column6: and way too tender. What's too tender
column8: if you could take the pork and sell it as baby food
column9: you may have crossed the line from "tender" to "mushy." I didn't know this was possible to do with meat
column10: but Smoque showed me that it is.
